verses.text: Then answered Bildad the Shuhite, and said,
Dominion and fear arewith him, He maketh peace in his high places.
Is there anynumber of his armies? And upon whom doth not his light arise?
How then can man be justified with God? Or how can he be clean that isborn of a woman?
Behold evento the moon, and it shineth not; Yea, the stars are not pure in his sight.
How much less man, that isa worm? And the son of man, which isa worm?
